column2: an A.M. Eatery////Determined to have a good time
column3: my friends and I ordered the CHILAQUILES BENEDICT
column6: CAPRESE BENEDICT (ala the Benny Duo! a fantastic deal if you can't decide on just one)
column9: and the PANCAKE OF THE DAY (strawberry cheesecake
column10: I think?). Everyone was extremely pleased and were basically raving about the food all day. (Pro tip: ask for your hashbrowns to be flat and crispy). Additionally
column11: the incredibly sweet waitress brought us PANCAKE FLIGHT of PINEAPPLE UPSIDE DOWN
column13: and BLUEBERRY pancakes for my friend's birthday.
